PathOfBuilding.Notes:
Tri Herald setup
Wishing for alot more aoe
Trying to think about dropping 2 heralds and going for HOI linked skills [Base crit, inc crit, inc aoe, hypothermia], this means also dropping inpulsas.
Might just be annighlating light angle idk.
minmaxing getting tough here: fractured temple mod with with crit mod, accuracy and +2 aoe. Way easier to not have to convert and not have accuracy.
what skill for annihglating light if not worb or bv?
